WorkItem.Description:
Dear Sir：
Thank you for providing such a great product. When I try to apply, there is an error, please help me, thank you! 

 Main problems are as follows:

namespace：
xmlns:Controls="clr-namespace:Microsoft.Cui.Controls;assembly=Microsoft.Cui.Controls" 
xmlns:local="clr-namespace:Nhs.Cui.Futures.Demonstrator.Controls;assembly=Nhs.Cui.Futures.Demonstrator.Controls"
xmlns:controls="clr-namespace:System.Windows.Controls;assembly=System.Windows.Controls" 
xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/presentation"
xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml"
xmlns:d="http://schemas.microsoft.com/expression/blend/2008"
xmlns:mc="http://schemas.openxmlformats.org/markup-compatibility/2006"

XAML Code:
 <Grid x:Name="LayoutRoot" >
    <local:DockPanelContainer x:Name="dockPanelContainer1"  Margin="0, 5, 0, 5">
        <local:DockPanel x:Name="adminDockPanel1" Height="813" IsTabStop="False" Margin="5, 5, 5, 5" MinHeight="50" MinWidth="100" Width="275">
            <local:DockPanel.HeaderTemplate>
                ......
            </local:DockPanel.HeaderTemplate>
            <StackPanel>
                <TextBox x:Name="txtTest"></TextBox>
                <Button x:Name="btnTest" Click="BtnTest_Click"></Button>
            </StackPanel>
        </local:DockPanel>
       </local:DockPanelContainer>
</Grid>

Back code:
 void BtnTest_Click(object sender, RoutedEventArgs e)
    {
        this.txtTest.Text = "Hello!";
    }

When F5,Then click button "BtnTest",Error occurred:
 NullReferenceException，means TextBox must be instantiated.but textbox named txtTest Is dragged from the Toolbox to the interface。
